"レベル75制限解除試験・Ｈｕ":
"This is a test to release Hunter's limits.
By acquiring the specified titles,
you'll be able to obtain higher levels.

※Requires the title from grinding a ★13
Sword, Partizan, or Wired Lance to +35
※Requires title from completing Ohza's
client order [The Perfect Hunter IV]."
"Obtain the title [Pioneer of Hunter NT Upgrades]"
